hero_subtitle: Military-grade AI orchestration engine coordinating 93 models across 15 agent frameworks with real-time swarm routing, multi-tier consensus, and GPU cloud integration.
section_models: Auto-routing classifies prompt complexity and dispatches to optimal tier for latency-quality tradeoff.
section_agents: 15 specialized frameworks for autonomous task execution, memory management, and multi-agent coordination.
section_architecture: End-to-end request flow from application layer through SwarmRouter to model execution.
section_cloud: A100 80GB GPU cluster running vLLM, AutoML, OCR, and research agent workloads.
section_repos: Complete repository map spanning agent frameworks, OSINT tools, security scanners, and development utilities.
section_sentinel: OSINT-powered security monitoring and threat intelligence platform integrated with guardian-cli.
